articles.author: Elena Giordano
articles.title: Hundreds protest in Syria after Christmas tree set alight - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ruling HTS say they have detained the arsonists and promised to restore the tree.
articles.content:
According to the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, the fighters were foreigners from the Islamist group Ansar al-Tawhid.
Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS), the main Islamist faction which led the uprisi… [+629 chars]
